channel.title: All JavaFX jobs | upwork.com

item.title: ✅ Master Wordsmith Needed: Craft Mind-Bending Tales of Universal Wonders - Upwork
item.description:
Master Wordsmith Needed: Craft Mind-Bending Tales of Universal Wonders [Potential FULL-TIME POSITION]

Are you ready to unravel the mysteries of existence through the power of words? We're seeking a master storyteller to join our journey into the unknown on a long-term basis. If you can transform complex concepts into captivating narratives that leave people spellbound, we want you!

What we're looking for:

• A wordsmith with a passion for the fundamental questions of reality
• Ability to weave extensive epics that turn mind-boggling ideas into edge-of-your-seat adventures
• Knack for crafting irresistible titles that spark curiosity and demand attention
• Skill in maintaining engagement throughout long-form content
• Deep understanding of cutting-edge theories and discoveries across multiple fields
• Creativity to find fresh angles on well-known concepts
• Talent for explaining complex ideas in accessible, exciting ways
• Strong research skills to ensure accuracy and depth

The storyteller we seek will:

• Produce extensive narratives
• Dive deep into topics that challenge our understanding of reality
• Capture the essence of our existing style while infusing it with fresh energy
• Collaborate closely with our team to refine and elevate each tale
• Write the story and script with your creativity and skill, using A.I. only for supportive assistance

This is not just a job, but an opportunity to embark on an ongoing expedition through the fabric of reality itself. We're looking for a long-term creative partners to help us explore the greatest mysteries of existence.

To apply, send us a 2000+ word sample (previous work) that showcases your ability to transform a complex concept into a riveting story. Include your approach to crafting attention-grabbing titles and maintaining fascination throughout extended narratives.

Join us in our mission to bring extraordinary stories to life, one word at a time. A world of endless possibilities awaits!


Posted On: July 16, 2024 12:39 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Java, GitHub, JavaFX, Creative Writing, English, Ghostwriting, Graphic Design, Copywriting, Writing
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Experienced JavaFX developer(s) for developing/improving a JavaFX app - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for developer(s) to work with our team on a project -  skilled and experienced in JavaFX and/or Java developer(s) capable to solve an issue when apps in SWING launched from JavaFX app block themselves and do not launch and also refine, organize and improve the code and functionalities of the local app in JavaFX (security, application update mechanisms, interface design and conditions on fields, local app security and user authentication module etc.).

Project details:
JAVA FX App to be fixed as above and current code reviewed.
The app is part of a client server architecture and works locally by communicating with the central server.
- Task(s) – various tasks regarding the implementation of functionalities in our apps as per our needs.
- Tasks will be given by us via our ticketing system, or via our chat system. The developer will work together with our team and shall coordinate with our team of back-end developers and the development will be made in parallel.

Requirements:
- Extensive and proven know how of JavaFX. Deep knowledge of Java constitutes a plus
- Experience with API's creation SOAP and REST
- Experience with Spring Framework and Hibernate
- Experience with REST API;
- Knowledge of web application best practices regarding the development and security of the applications – implementation of modern security controls and protection for the pages and access.
- Extensive know-how and proven expertise with a Java FX apps, security mechanisms and efficiency of resources usage, glitches etc.;

If the applicant is a particularly good fit, it may be invited to remain with our team on a long term basis.
Depending on the amount of work and expertise the budget might be increased.


Posted On: July 14, 2024 12:57 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Web Application, API Integration, RESTful API, Java, JavaScript, API
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: Senior Java Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Java Lead Position:
Role: Senior Java Developer
Experience: 10+ years
Location: India working US Hours

Job description: 
Must have skills: 
10+ years of Overall development experience and experience in architecture, design and third-party service integration, integration experience with web technologies.

Extensive experience in API&#39;s / Web services / Databases / Queuing / Background Job processing.
Hands on experience on SpringBoot framework to develop RestAPIs and Database integration.
Extensive experience with successful implementations of highly scalable and highly available systems
Experience with agile development processes, must be able to plan and execute sprints.
Experience on AWS or Azure cloud technologies.
Experience in API gateway integration and configuration.
Should be familiar and able to define deployment cycle, manage multiple environments builds.
Should be able to follow best practices and standards, explore the technology landscape to evaluate alternative solutions to meet or exceed business functional and non-functional
needs.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand long &amp; short-term business needs.
Good understanding on JavaFX/Swing applications development.
Nice to have: HTML CSS, Angular, JavaScript, MSSQL, JavaFlex, JavaFX
Requirement 
Technologies mentioned in the mandatory skills
Expertise in backend and frontend technologies (Java/Angular or any), Web services, APIs
and any RDBMS
 Development tools (Maven, Ant, Jira, Eclipse)
 Build and Deployment using DevOps tools like Jenkins.
 Any source versioning control tools expertise
 Good knowledge on OOPS concepts and design/integration patterns
 Strong research, analysis, problem solving and evaluation skills
 Strong analytical ability as it relates to system design
 Ability to present to stakeholders in easily understandable manner
 Candidate should have experience in working on cloud-based platforms like AWS / Azure
 Knowledge of multiple front-end languages and libraries (HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, XML, JSON,
jQuery, AngularJS, NodeJS) 
 Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
 Degree in Computer Science, or relevant field. 
 Responsibilities 
 Hands-on contribution to the technical code and design documentation
 Support Product Evaluations and Technical proof-of-concepts
 Assist in responding to RFPs and RFIs
 Identify and evaluate the technologies that will be used for the projects based on
requirements &amp; technology trends

 Evaluate and recommend the development methodologies, frameworks, and modelling
techniques
 Identify and address architectural challenges
 Ensure that the application design is adequately documented and approved
 Understand / apply reusable code design, leverage application architecture / framework
capabilities and functionality, and design / develop solutions that are highly reliable,
scalable, and perform to meet business-defined service levels
 Conduct code reviews and ensuring quality solutions are built and tested
 Take full ownership of code quality and deliverables
 Help developers see the value of the architecture and understand how to use it successfully

Budget: $1,900
Posted On: June 28, 2024 13:21 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:AWS Lambda, Azure DevOps, RESTful API, Java, Web Services Development
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Java developer(s) for developing/improving an app - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for some extra hands to work with our team on a project -  skilled and experienced Java and/or JavaFX developer(s) capable to convert API's from SOAP to REST and also refine, organize and improve the code and functionalities of a local app in JavaFX (security, application update mechanisms, interface design and conditions on fields, local app security and user authentication module etc.).

Project details:
JAVA FX App to be executed in order to connect to the corresponding API's in our ecosystems
The app is part of a client server architecture and works locally by communicating with the central server.
- Task(s) – various tasks regarding the implementation of functionalities in our apps as per our needs.
- Tasks will be given by us via our ticketing system, or via our chat system. The developer will work together with our team and shall coordinate with our team of back-end developers and the development will be made in parallel.

Requirements:
- Extensive know how of Java. Deep knowledge of JavaFX constitutes a plus
- Experience with API's creation SOAP and REST
- Experience with Spring Framework and Hibernate
- Experience with REST API;
- Knowledge of web application best practices regarding the development and security of the applications – implementation of modern security controls and protection for the pages and access.
- Extensive know-how and proven expertise with a Java FX apps, security mechanisms and efficiency of resources usage, glitches etc.;

If the applicant is a particularly good fit, it may be invited to remain with our team on a long term basis.
Depending on the amount of work and expertise the budget might be increased.


Posted On: May 30, 2024 13:18 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Web Application, API Integration, RESTful API, Java, JavaScript, API
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: JavaFX Desktop Application Developer - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:

We are a small, passionate team of developers dedicated to creating high-quality open-source software. Our current project, SaulPOS, is an exciting JavaFX desktop application aimed at revolutionizing point-of-sale systems. We believe in collaboration, continuous learning, and fostering a positive working environment.

https://github.com/saulhidalgoaular/saulpos

Position:

JavaFX Desktop Application Developer
Responsibilities:

  *  Develop and enhance the SaulPOS application using JavaFX.
   * Collaborate closely with the team to design and implement new features.
   * Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.
   * Maintain and improve the quality of the codebase.

Requirements:

*   Experience: At least one prior project involving JavaFX development.
*   Skills: Proficient in Java and familiar with JavaFX.
*   Languages: Fluent in English or Spanish (Spanish preferred).
*   Attitude: Positive, eager to learn, and a team player.

Ideal Candidate:

*   Has a strong passion for open-source projects.
*   Enjoys working in a collaborative and supportive environment.
*   Is self-motivated and proactive in problem-solving.
*  Willing to continuously learn and adapt to new challenges.



Hourly Range: $3.00-$4.00
Posted On: May 21, 2024 00:14 UTC
Category: Desktop Software Development
Skills:JavaFX, Java, Desktop Application
Country: Venezuela
click to apply
